brewery.name: Beardslee Public House
brewery.description: Drew Cluley, an award-winning master brewer, brings 20 years of extensive craft brewing experience to Beardslee Public House. Drew began his brewing career in Seattle at Pyramid Brewing Company when it opened in 1995. Following a stint as a brewery consultant in Nagano, Japan, Drew returned to the states and worked at Pyramid Alehouse and Big Time Brewery. He eventually became Pike Brewing Company’s assistant head brewer in 2000 when his first commercially produced recipe was released, and became Pike’s head brewer and production manager in 2006. In 2011, Drew returned to Big Time Brewery as head brewer before joining Chef John Howie in June 2014 to design and develop the Beardslee Public House beer program.
